product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adapter, USB Cable, Sim Card Tool, Screen Protect Film, Case, Important Info Booklet with Warranty Card, Quick Guide
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Integrated Audio Decoding Chip, Hi-Res Audio Certification
product_specification.Other Display Features: 90 Hz Refresh Rate, Aspect Ratio: 20:9, Screen-to-Body Ratio: 90.50%, Screen Contrast: 1500:1, Brightness: 480 nit (Maximum 600 nit (Sunlight)), Color Saturation: 96% NTSC
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 48MP Primary Camera (Samsung S5KGM1ST, f/1.8 Aperture, FOV: 79.8 Degree, Focal Length: 25.4 mm, 6P Lens, 1/2 inch Sensor Size, 0.80 um Pixel Size, PDAF) + 2MP Portrait Camera (Galaxycore GC02M1B, f/2.4 Aperture, 89.1 Degree, Focal Length: 21.9 mm, 3P Lens, 1/5 inch Sensor Size, 1.75 um Pixel Size, Fixed Focus) + 2MP Macro Camera (Galaxycore GC02M1, f/2.4 Aperture, FOV: 88.8 Degree, Focal Length: 21.9 mm, 3P Lens, 1/5 inch Sensor Size, 1.75 um Pixel Size, 4cm Fixed Focus), CMOS, Camera Feature: Photo, Video, NightScape, 48M, Professional, Panoramic, Portrait, Timelapse, Slow Motion, Hypertext, Super Macro, Street Photography, 20 Continous Shooting, Video Feature: Slow Motion, EIS Video Stabilization
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16MP Camera Setup: Samsung S5K3P9SP04, f/2.1 Aperture, FOV: 79.3 Degree, Focal Length: 25.6 mm, 1.31 inch Sensor Size, 1.0 um Pixel Size, 5P Lens, Fixed Focus, Camera Feature: Photo, Video, Panoramic, Portrait, NightScape, Timelapse, EIS Video Stabilization
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 120 fps), 1080p (at 30 fps), 1080p (at 30 fps) | Front Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Magnetic Induction Sensor, Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Gyro-meter, Acceleration Sensor, Side Mounted Fingerprint Sensor
product_specification.Ringtones Format: MP3, AMR, APE, OGG, FLAC, WAV, WMA
product_specification.Other Features: 180 Hz Touch Sampling Rate, COG Sealing Process, In-cell Touch Panel Technology, 10 Touch Points, Back Cover Material: PC + PMMA, Glass Type: Glass, Taking Photos Methods: Touch, Key, Gesture, RAM Channel: 2, RAM Frequency: 2133 MHz, UFS 2.1, ROM Channel: 2, 18 W Maximum Charging Power, Wi-Fi Antenna Technology: 1 x 1 SISO, RF Antenna Technology: 4 × 4 MIMO, Bluetooth Audio Codec: SBC, AAC, APTX, APTX-HD, LDAC, Phone Locked Functions: Face Unlock, Fingerprint Unlock, Password Unlock, Pattern Unlock, Google Smart Lock, Wet Fingerprint Unlock, Face Unlock Technology, File Encryption, Private Space, Private Apps, OTG Storage Format: VFAT, EXFAT, NTFS, 1 Microphone, Vibrating Motor Type: Rotor Motor, 1 Speaker, Heat Dissipation Technology: Graphite, Supports L1 Level WideVine, Web Video Play Supported, Press to Answer Calls, Headphones Monitor, Split Screen, Clone Apps, Kids Space, Voice Wake Up, Night Shiled, Step Tracker, Game Space, App Market, Theme Store, Clone Phone, Phone Manager, Google Lens, Data Backup, Files Compression and Decompression, World Time, Import and Export Contacts
product_specification.GPS Type: GPS, AGPS, BEIDOU, GLONASS, QZSS, GALILEO
product_specification.Audio Formats: MP3, AAC, APE, AMR, WAV, OGG, FLAC, WMA
product_specification.Video Formats: AVI, 3GP, MP4, WMV, MKV, MOV, ASF, FLV
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty for Phone and 6 Months Warranty for In-Box Accessories

product_description.Sophisticated Processor: This phone boasts a Dimensity 810 5G processor that can clock up to 2.4 GHz and is powered by a sophisticated 6 nm architecture, making your experience flawless and minimising the time it takes to interface with your preferred app.
product_description.Flawless Encounter: This phone's 16.51 cm (6.5) LCD display ensures that you have a great movie-watching or gaming experience. This phone also has a stunning 90 Hz refresh rate and 180 Hz touch sampling rate, ensuring that every flick and flip is incredibly gentle.
product_description.RAM Expansion: The realme 9 5G features Dynamic RAM Expansion Technology, which lets you add up to 5 GB of virtual RAM to your phone, enhancing its functional ease and multitasking capabilities.
product_description.Robust Battery: This phone boasts a 5000 mAh battery and 18 W Fast Charge enables you to charge your battery quickly and effectively, giving you a full day's worth of power in a short amount of time, making it more productive and dependable.
product_description.Mesmerising Imagery: The 48 MP camera powered by AI creates magical moments by capturing impeccable pictures. Furthermore, this phone's Street Photography Mode allows you to click mesmerising images with beautiful visuals even in low-light situations.
product_description.Astonishing Visuals: The Fluid Light Design on the realme 9 5G uses nano-coating technology to provide colour shifting capabilities, enriching your visual experience.
product_description.Fingerprint Superiority: The power button works flawlessly with the fingerprint recognition on this smartphone, allowing you to unlock your phone almost immediately and offering additional security.
product_description.Immaculate Selfies: This phone's 16 MP front camera allows you to capture crystal clear selfies and keep all of your memories alive.
product_description.Sophisticated Storage: With up to 4 GB of RAM and up to 64 GB of internal storage, you can save more images, movies, and work-related documents conveniently on this phone for quick access.

review:
Nice phone value for money

After 3 day usage......... dynamic ram expansion isn't available on 4 GB variant till now, don't know if it will be available in future updates, Realme should've mentioned this on their ongoing super hyped publicity, otherwise this phone is really good.

I purchased this on yesterday. Belive me this is the one most Best smartphone. Design of the phone is Beautiful. It has 90hz but it feels like 120hz.Camera is awesome.Performance is superb.And it has good battey backup.4g career aggregation is also available. portrait mode and age detection of the camera is nice 👍. In one sentence The phone is Awesomeee ! I recommend this phone . Don't think go for it !

5 camera is ok..ok but not the best

Overall it was good for normal users with good battary backup

This is a really good mobile. It's specifications are really good and best for minimal use. The main issue with it is the charging time, it really take 2 or more hours for full charge and this is a real problem when compared to it's reveal mobiles. This would have been a great mobile for the price if it had atleast 33W charger instead of 18W.

pros.5000 mAh Battery: The robust 5000 mAh battery is powerful enough to make this phone last for more than a day.
pros.Camera: The triple rear camera and 16MP front camera does a good job of capturing some really impeccable images.
pros.16.51 cm (6.5) LCD display: The 16.51 cm (6.5 inch) Full HD+ LCD (LTPS) display of this phone is mesmerizing. The 90hz refresh rate ensures a smooth viewing experience.

cons.Charger: This phone comes with a 18W charger which takes a long time to fully charge the device. Should have provided with a more powerful charger.

summary.verdict: The realme 9 5G is a good budget phone with some amazing features such as powerful battery, beautiful display and decent camera.
summary.Additional Information: Side mounted fingerprint sensor, 5G support, Supports PubG and BGMI.
